Using a paper cutter: A paper cutter can be used to cut through thin materials like paper or thin plastic.
Using a box cutter: A box cutter can be used to cut through thicker materials like cardboard or thin plastic.
Using a pair of scissors (if available): If you have access to scissors, you can use them to cut through thin materials like paper or fabric.
Using a saw: A saw can be used to cut through thicker materials like wood or metal.
Using a pair of pliers with a file: You can use a pair of pliers with a file to cut through thin materials like wires or small branches.
